title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5706.1 - Violations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5706.1 - Violations

State Regulations
(a) Violation of
any rule or regulation governing or regulating traffic on that portion of the
bridge within the territorial limits of the United States of America shall be a
traffic infraction, as that is defined in the Vehicle and Traffic Law of the

State of New York, and shall be punishable as such. (b) Violation of any other rule or regulation
contained herein shall be cause for denial of the use of the bridge at the
discretion of the bridge manager or his agent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5706.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
